INDIANAPOLIS – Reaction spread across Indiana Tuesday after President Donald Trump ’s historic meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un . “ [ARG0: I] [ARGM-ADV: just] [V: hope] [ARG1: you can trust them] , ” Gene Esselborn said at the VFW Post 98 in Indianapolis Tuesday , a Korean War veteran .
